Sign into a Beta enabled user 2. Go to WS 3. Tap on the "New" dropdown button > "New domain"" 4. Enter a domain which already exists (For example "Applause.com") ## Expected Result: Error message stating that the Domain already exists should be translated ## Actual Result: Error message displays only in English The "Validation code not found, will retry after 24 hours" message is also not translated to Spanish ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cf3ba337-d309-40ff-975f-136104e0fff5 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

**Issue reported by:** @daledah 
**Slack conversation** (hyperlinked to channel name): [#Open Source](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C01GTK53T8Q/p1765129896426569)

## Action Performed:
1. Login to the app
2. Go to offline mode
3. Create a new workspace
4. Go to Workflows page
5. Observed that everything was grayed out
6. Go to Reports page
## Expected Result:
Text `Report title` and `Customize report titles` are grayed out. 
## Actual Result:
Text `Report title` and `Customize report titles` are not grayed out
## Workaround:
Unknown

title: [$250] Android - Reports - Menu is not scrollable, Delete button is partially blocked by navigation bar

labels.name: Reviewing
labels.description: Has a PR in review

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Hourly
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.75-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/73855 , https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/75729 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** isjdsoijsojnsiojisndj@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution **Device used:** Samsung Galaxy S25 FE / Android 16 **App Component:** Search ## Action Performed: 1. Launch Expensify app. 2. Go to workspace chat. 3. Create an expense. 4. Tap Submit on the expense preview. 5. Go to Reports > Reports. 6. Long tap on the expense report > Select. 7. Tap dropdown button. ## Expected Result: Now that there are two more options (Change approver, Split) in More menu, the menu should be scrollable and will not be blocked by the navigation bar. ## Actual Result: The menu is not scrollable and Delete button is partially blocked by the navigation bar. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7602dcf0-e537-4241-ba0b-9a4cfbbafead [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.75-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** N/A - new feature, doesn't exist in prod **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/75729 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** isjdsoijsojnsiojisndj@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution **Device used:** Samsung Galaxy S25 FE / Android 16 **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Precondition: - Android 16 only. - Device font size is minimum. 1. Launch Expensify app. 2. Go to workspace chat. 3. Create an expense. 4. Tap Submit. 5. Go to Reports > Menu > Reports. 6. Select the report by long tapping > Select. 7. Tap dropdown button > Change approver. ## Expected Result: "Add approver" will be displayed. ## Actual Result: "Add" is displayed instead of "Add approver" on Change approver page. This issue only happens when "Change approver" page is opened from Reports. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3e922090-db92-47d2-947a-43e3cce3c19e [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.75-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/76241 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+khcategory20@applause.expensifail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Bug source:** Pull Request QA execution **Device used:** Mac 26.1 / Chrome **App Component:** Workspace Settings ## Action Performed: Precondition: - Workspace is set up with Expensify Card feature. 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to workspace settings > Expensify Card. 3. Click Issue card. 4. Go through the flow and reach the confirm page. 5. On confirm page, click Issue card. 6. On magic code page, click RHP back button until it reaches the first page - Who needs a card? 7. Click RHP back button again. 8. Click RHP back buton. ## Expected Result: In Step 7, RHP will close. In Step 8, RHP will close. ## Actual Result: In Step 7, RHP reopens magic code page. In Step 8, RHP reopens Who needs a card? step. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/746d553e-5531-4e4a-96a0-0416d487584f [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
